rectangle0, rfpoint0 = annoextractor.getclip_rfpoint(pagenumber=pagenumber0, rectangleorder=rectangleorder0)

# Operation 1
argument0 = dict(clip=rectangle0, font="Arial", fontsize=12, align=fitz.TEXT_ALIGN_CENTER)
Text_manipulator0 = PDFbf.manipulate_text(

    font=argument0.get("font"),

    align=argument0.get("align"),
)
Text_manipulator0.text = Text_manipulator0.gethortext()
